name: Prisonfall
description:
Prisonfall is an arcade game about escaping from a medieval prison.
You are a prisoner in a prison with ghosts who used to keep order. It happened that you
managed to get out of the shackles and now you can move freely throughout the prison. Can you
go through all the tests and traps on the way to escape? Dodge spikes, jump over chasms
and run away from the former guards as soon as possible.

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics.
- Various levels.
